answers.a: Three or more sample means from dependent groups
answers.b: Three or more sample means from independent groups
answers.c: Two sample means from dependent groups
answers.d: Two sample means from independent groups

questions.question: In one way ANOVA, the null hypothesis states that

answers.a: Atleast one group mean is different from others
answers.d: The sample means are normally distributed

questions.question: ANOVA assumes that, a dependent variable measure on a/an
The total sum of square in ANOVA represents

answers.a: The total variation in the data
answers.c: The sum of squares within groups
answers.d: The sum of square between groups
